pages.text: If you've come across a $(item)Heart of Diamond$(), surely you must've slain a $(thing)Stoneling$() in your travels. Worry not, should you right click with the heart on a block of stone, you'll get your very own friendly $(thing)Stoneling$()!$(br2)You can feed your friend Stone to make it love you. You can also give it any other item to have it carry it. Lastly, friendly $(thing)Stonelings$() will follow anyone carrying a $(item)Diamond$().
Alternatively, you may use the heart to create a $(item)Pickarang$(), a cool new way to mine! Throw it at a block and it'll break it and return to you with the drops!
